label: 扶桑略記
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Late eleventh c.? Thirty maki extant. A chronicle in Chinese of Japanese history from Emperor Jimmu to Emperor Horikawa, by the monk Kōen. [神武天皇 堀河天皇 皇円阿闍梨]
